Title: Enacts the "accessory dwelling unit incentive act"
Summary: Enacts the "accessory dwelling unit incentive act" to establish the accessory dwelling unit forgivable loan program by the division of homes and community renewal; defines terms; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add Art 33 §§1300 - 1302, Priv Hous Fin L; amd §606, Tax L; add §463, RPT L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, the tax law and the real property tax law, in relation to enacting the accessory dwelling unit incentive act
